Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the video shows an Indian fighter plane crashing off the coast of Karachi, Pakistan in June 2020, when in fact, it shows an Italian Air Force Eurofighter plane crashing off the Italian coast in 2017.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim that the video shows an Indian fighter plane crashing off the coast of Karachi.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact by misidentifying the plane in the video and attributing it to the wrong country and location.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that the video is related to Indian fighter jets flying over Karachi, without providing any evidence or confirmation.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the video actually shows an Italian Air Force plane crashing during an airshow in 2017, as confirmed by multiple sources and reports.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misidentifying the plane in the video and attributing it to the wrong country and location.
